title: Mount & Blade Complete Collection (2.1.1.11) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Navigate to the Mount & Blade folder and run "setup_mount_and_blade_2.0.0.4"
2. Navigate to the Mount & Blade With Fire & Sword folder and run "setup_mount_and_blade_with_fire_and_sword_2.0.0.4"
3. Navigate to the Mount & Blade With Fire & Sword folder and in the Patch folder within it run "patch_mount_and_blade_with_fire_and_sword_2.1.0.5"
4. Navigate to the Mount & Blade Warband folder and run "setup_mount_and_blade_warband_2.2.0.10"
5. Navigate to the Mount & Blade With Warband folder and in the Patch folder within it run "patch_mount_and_blade_warband_2.2.1.11"
6. Navigate to the Mount & Blade Warband - Nepoleonic Wars and run "setup_mount_and_blade_napoleonic_wars_dlc_2.1.1.11"
7. Navigate to the Mount & Blade Warband - Viking Conquest and run "setup_mount_and_blade_viking_conquest_dlc_2.1.1.11"
8. Play!
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

DLC Included:
Mount & Blade: With Fire & Sword
Mount & Blade: Warband
Mount & Blade Warband - Nepoleonic Wars
Mount & Blade Warband - Viking Conquest

Title: MOUNT & BLADE
Genre: Role-playing - Action - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Text only: Deutsch, English, espaÃƒÂ±ol, polski, TÃƒÂ¼rkÃƒÂ§e
Modes: Single-player

Size: 467 MB
Company: TaleWorlds Entertainment / TaleWorlds Entertainment
Rating: ESRB Rating: Teen (with Alcohol Reference, Blood, Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Violence)
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/mount_blade

About:
Calradia is a land at war, offering great riches and even greater dangers to adventurers and mercenaries that flock to shed their blood on its soil. With courage and a strong sword, an unknown stranger can make a name as a warrior.
Free-form sand-box gameplay. You are free to go anywhere in a world with more than a hundred unique locations including villages, castles and towns.
Groundbreaking horseback combat.
Highly advanced and intuitive sword-fighting systems.
Fight on horseback and foot using a vast variety of medieval weapons, each with unique characteristics.
You can be anything from a lonesome adventurer to a commander of armies or an owner of villages, castles or towns.
Sophisticated AI will challenge you in combat and in your strategic plans.
Freedom to interact with hundreds of characters.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP/Vista/7/8, 512 MB RAM, Graphics card with at least 64 MB memory, 700 MB HDD space, Mouse, Keyboard
